pr_title: PLANNER-1985:  [Tasks Assignment] Add task assignment tables to the DB scripts

timeline.message: PLANNER-1985:  [Tasks Assignment] Add task assignment tables to the DB scripts

timeline.bodyText:
The jBPM sql script uses "lock datarows" for every table it creates. Is there any motivation for keeping the default "page locking" of sybase [1]?
[1] http://infocenter.sybase.com/help/index.jsp?topic=/com.sybase.dc20021_1251/html/locking/locking9.htm
timeline.author: rsynek
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+    create table PlanningTask (
+        taskId numeric(19,0) not null,
+        assignedUser varchar(255),
+        taskIndex int not null,
+        lastModificationDate datetime,
+        published smallint not null,
+        primary key (taskId)
+    )

replies.bodyText: good catch, no there's no reason. Just forgot to add it, I'll fix it.
replies.author: wmedvede
